items.name: Gardening Apron
items.customDescription: -2.5% Farming Growth Interval. +5% chance to preserve seeds when harvesting Shrubs and Flowers.

items.name: Superfertilizer
items.customDescription: Fills Farming Compost to 100% per use. +30% Increased crop harvest

items.name: Nasturtium
items.customDescription: +17.5% Farming Yield for Watermelon, Booberry, and Goldengod Hops. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Thyme
items.customDescription: +15% Farming Yield for Cabbage, Poison Ivy, and Bell Peppers. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: White Lily
items.customDescription: +5% Farming Yield for all crops and +10% chance to preserve Compost. Consumed on Harvesting.

items.name: Rose
items.customDescription: +12.5% Farming Yield for Potatoes, Plumm Hops, and Coffee Beans. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Tulip
items.customDescription: +10% Farming Yield for Blueberries, Orange Trees, and Snape Grass. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Sunflower
items.customDescription: +7.5% Farming Yield for Onions, Tomatoes, Sweetcorn, and Carrots. Those crops cannot die. Consumed on Planting and Harvesting.

items.name: Lavender
items.customDescription: +5% Farming Yield for all Shrubs and Hops. +5% chance to preserve Food when eaten. Consumed on Planting, Harvesting, and on Eating.

items.name: Lantern Oil
items.customDescription:
+2.5% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation and +5% Global Accuracy Rating.
+5% Global Accuracy Rating when equipped with Blazing Lantern and Shroud of the Badlands.

items.name: Shroud of the Badlands
items.customDescription:
+20% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation and -0.05 Attack Interval.
+10% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation when equipped with Blazing Lantern.

items.name: Tormented Bracelet
items.customDescription: Greatly increased Magic Accuracy Rating and Magic Damage. Greatly decreased Defence bonuses and Damage Reduction.

items.name: Pure Elementalist Sceptre
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum and Maximum Elemental Spell Dmg. Reduces the Elemental Rune cost of Magic Spells by 2 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Glacia God Helmet (P)
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells. +2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

items.name: Glacia God Platelegs (P)
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells.+2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

items.name: Glacia God Platebody (P)
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells. +2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

items.name: Glacia God Boots (P)
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells.+2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

items.name: Glacia God Gloves (P)
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Damage when using Water Spells. +2% chance to Freeze target on hit.

items.name: Ancient Staff
items.customDescription:
Passive: +5 Minimum Damage when using Elemental Spells.
+6% Accuracy Rating and Maximum Hit when using Surge Spells.
Reduces the Elemental Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Fragmented Elemental Rune
items.customDescription: Provides 1 Rune of each element. +10 Minimum and Maximum Elemental Spell Dmg. One item is consumed whenever Runes are used.

items.name: Elemental Cape
items.customDescription: Passive: +50 Minimum Elemental Spell Dmg

items.name: Chieftain Erik's Head
items.customDescription: The head of the tyrannical chieftain of Barbarian Village, a sign of true strength to the Barbarians.

items.name: Barbarian Archer Helm
items.customDescription: When equipped with any Throwing Weapon: +5% Ranged Crit Chance and +10% Ranged Accuracy Rating

items.name: Barbarian Berserker Helm
items.customDescription:
Passive: While at or below 50% of your Maximum Hit Points, gain: +10% Melee Maximum Hit, -10% Attack Interval, +10% Melee Crit Chance, and -30% Global Evasion.
When equipped with Barbarian Berserker Axe, gain +2% Melee Lifesteal.

items.name: Barbarian Warrior Helm
items.customDescription: When equipped with Barbarian Longblade, gain +25% Melee Accuracy Rating.

items.name: Barbarian Boots
items.customDescription:
Passive: +1% melee crit chance
When equipped with Barbarian Armour and Barbarian Skirt: +10% crit chance

items.name: Barbarian Skirt
items.customDescription:
Passive: +2% melee crit chance
When equipped with Barbarian Armour and Barbarian Boots: +10% crit chance

items.name: Barbarian Armour
items.customDescription:
Passive: +3% melee crit chance
When equipped with Barbarian Skirt and Barbarian Boots: +10% crit chance

items.name: Barbarian Longblade
items.customDescription: When equipped with Barbarian Warrior Helm, gain +25% Melee Accuracy Rating.

items.name: Barbarian Fletching Knife
items.customDescription: -5% Fletching Interval when fletching Shortbows, Longbows, and Standard Arrows when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Beer
items.customDescription:
10% of your Strength Level added as Hidden Strength levels
50% of your Attack Level subtracted as Hidden Attack Levels

items.name: Keg of Beer
items.customDescription:
10% of your Strength Level added as Hidden Strength levels
50% of your Attack Level subtracted as Hidden Attack Levels

items.name: Amulet of Occults
items.customDescription: Reduces the Body Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Amulet (Cost cannot go below 1). -5% Summoning Attack Interval and +5% Chance to preserve Summoning Charges

items.name: Sand
items.customDescription: Sandy.

items.name: Monkey Dung
items.customDescription: Disgustingly useless.

items.name: Dust Imbued Wand
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 3 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Mystic Dust Staff
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 3 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Dust Battlestaff
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 2 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Mysterious Tome
items.customDescription: The cover of this battered tome is inscribed with runes of the four elements. Its pages are filled largely indecipherable glyphs and schemes, except for one, written in ancient Melvorian: 'Seek the Sanctuary of our People.'

items.name: Tome of the Elements
items.customDescription:
Reduces the Elemental Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Off-hand (Cost cannot go below 1).
Increases Maximum Hit and Accuracy of Elemental Spells by 25% when equipped.

items.name: Tome of Air
items.customDescription:
Reduces the Air Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Off-hand (Cost cannot go below 1).
Increases Maximum Hit and Accuracy of Air Spells by 20% when equipped.

items.name: Tome of Water
items.customDescription:
Reduces the Water Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Off-hand (Cost cannot go below 1).
Increases Maximum Hit and Accuracy of Water Spells by 20% when equipped.

items.name: Tome of Earth
items.customDescription:
Reduces the Earth Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Off-hand (Cost cannot go below 1).
Increases Maximum Hit and Accuracy of Earth Spells by 20% when equipped.

items.name: Tome of Fire
items.customDescription:
Reduces the Fire Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Off-hand (Cost cannot go below 1).
Increases Maximum Hit and Accuracy of Fire Spells by 20% when equipped.

attacks.name: Blood Tithe
attacks.description: Your melee attack heals you for ${lifesteal}% of the damage dealt.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <AttPos> attack heals <attacker> for <lifesteal> of the damage dealt.

attacks.name: Elemental Breath
attacks.description: Breathe unavoidable elemental dragonfire that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s. Inflicts either Burn, Freeze, Sleep, or Stun (10% chance each).
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Breathe <avoidable> elemental dragonfire that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>. <HitEffect>.

attacks.name: Harpiar's Song
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% normal damage each hit (unavoidable if Accuracy Rating is greater than or equal to 20,000). On hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times, dealing <damage> each hit (<avoidable> if Accuracy Rating is 20,000+). On hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Flame_Lash
attacks.description: The enemy lashes out with a fiery whip ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of its Magic level + 1, with a 50% chance to has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the your current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s on hit.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> lashes out with a fiery whip <count> times, dealing <damage>, with a 50% chance to <hitEffect> on hit.

attacks.name: Rollin' Rollin'
attacks.description: The Rock Giant rolls its body around like a massive boulder, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of its normal damage plus ${attackDamageMaxValue1} and applies stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn on hit.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: The <attacker> rolls <attPos> body around like a massive boulder, dealing <damage> and <hitEffect> on hit.

attacks.name: One-Two Punch
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times, dealing up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the first attack and up to ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your max hit on the second attack. Has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to strike with a Sucker Punch, stunning the enemy for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn

attacks.name: Sucker Punch
attacks.description: The enemy strikes with a sucker punch, dealing a whopping ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of their normal damage, which has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> sucker punches <target>, dealing a <damage>, that <hitEffect> on hit.

attacks.name: Wild Strikes
attacks.description: Make ${hitCount} consecutive attacks, each dealing up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% normal damage, but -${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Global Evasion that stacks up to ${preHitEffect0maxStacks} times until the end of the fight
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Make <count> consecutive attacks, each dealing up to <damage>, but <attacker> <prehitEffect>

attacks.name: Anguished Cry
attacks.description: The enemy lets out a gut-wrenching wail, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of its max hit. Has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn and has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to apply the Anguish I Curse for 3 turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> lets out a gut-wrenching wail, dealing <damage>. <HitEffect>.

attacks.name: Drown
attacks.description: Attempts to drown the enemy in sorrow, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} + 100% damage if the target is cursed.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> attempts to drown <target> in sorrow, dealing <damage>.

attacks.name: Zombie Summon
attacks.description: Perform a regular attack. On use, summon a Zombie Hand that attacks for 42 damage.

attacks.name: Zombie Summon
attacks.description: Performs a regular attack, then summons a Zombie Hand that attacks for 42 damage.

attacks.name: Zephyr Strike
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each. If your Accuracy Rating is higher than 20K then this attack can't miss.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times for <damage> damage each. If your Accuracy Rating is higher than 20K then this attack <canMiss>.

attacks.name: Cold Snap
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each (Can miss). On a hit, gives the enemy +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times for <damage> damage each (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each (Can miss). On a hit, puts the enemy to sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times dealing <damage> damage each (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Fierce Flames
attacks.description: Attack once dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage (Can miss). On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack once dealing <damage> damage (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

monsters.name: Ozmarathrax, Inscriptor of Runes
monsters.description: You will pay the price for defiling our sanctuary.

monsters.name: Hiro the Kappa
monsters.description: Part turtle, part reptile, all cowabunga.

monsters.name: Phylla the Harpiar
monsters.description: I've never heard such a sweet song before...

monsters.name: Olma, Fire Maiden
monsters.description: She carries the wrath of at least two suns.

monsters.name: Zeke the Rock Giant
monsters.description: In a past life, he wished to become rocks.

monsters.name: Barbarian
monsters.description: His name is probably Dave.

monsters.name: Barbarian Warrior
monsters.description: A fierce warrior from a bygone era.

monsters.name: Barbarian Bowyer
monsters.description: A bear's head for a hat? Scary.

monsters.name: Barbarian Berserker
monsters.description: I can smell the beer from here...

monsters.name: Barbarian Brawler
monsters.description: She's clearly been in a few fights.

monsters.name: Walking Keg
monsters.description: Are those feet? Nevermind.

monsters.name: Draugr
monsters.description: Not your typical zombie, I s'pose.

monsters.name: Drowned Maiden
monsters.description: Youuu will drowwwn as I diiid...

monsters.name: Chieftain Erik
monsters.description: You seek to challenge me?! Pathetic!

monsters.name: Jarl Eriksson
monsters.description: Thanks for killing my bastard father.

monsters.name: Koschei the Deathless
monsters.description: So you are here to prove yourself, then? Hah!

monsters.name: Koschei the Deathless
monsters.description: Hah! You fight well. I won't go easy this time.

monsters.name: Koschei the Deathless
monsters.description: Hngh. A lucky hit!

monsters.name: Koschei the Deathless
monsters.description: RAAAGGGHHH! Now witness TRUE strength!

monsters.name: Magic Golbin
monsters.description: A stinky golbin that practices the dark arts.

monsters.name: Hobgolbin
monsters.description: An ugly, smelly creature that even golbins stay away from.

monsters.name: Big Golbin
monsters.description: Is this really a golbin...?

monsters.name: Peasant Man
monsters.description: Just a regular ol' bloke.

monsters.name: Peasant Woman
monsters.description: Just a regular ol' gal.

monsters.name: Pickpocket
monsters.description: Cor blimey, mate! What is he doin' in me pockets?!

monsters.name: Guard
monsters.description: Why do they always have ugly helmets?

monsters.name: Executioner
monsters.description: Sure wouldn't want to commit any crimes 'round him!

monsters.name: Mysterious Monk
monsters.description: Mysterious.

monsters.name: Golbin Chief
monsters.description: Reek-reek! Shmig blig. Dorgoo!

monsters.name: Novice Necromancer
monsters.description: Probably still lives in his mum's basement.

monsters.name: Giant Grub
monsters.description: YUCK!

monsters.name: Sandy Devil
monsters.description: Nothing worse than getting sand in your eyes.

monsters.name: Lost Monkey
monsters.description: If only I had a banana...

monsters.name: Monk of the Wind
monsters.description: O! Long may the Winds carry the name of gentle Aeris.

monsters.name: Monk of the River
monsters.description: The Tide ebbs and flows, and thus brings Glacia's floes.

monsters.name: Monk of the Moss
monsters.description: Canst not thou feel th'embrace of Terran 'neath thy feet?

monsters.name: Monk of the Flame
monsters.description: Th' Flame o' Ragnar burneth within us all.

monsters.name: Guardian of the Elements
monsters.description: I CONTAIN THAT WHICH BINDS MELVOR.

categories.name: Fruit Trees
categories.seedNotice: Fruit Tree seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 1 in your bank.

categories.name: Shrubs
categories.description: A good place to grow berries, beans, and the like.
categories.seedNotice: Shrub seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 2 in your bank.

categories.name: Flowers
categories.description: Beautiful flowers to enhance your crops.
categories.seedNotice: Flower seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 5 in your bank.

categories.name: Hops
categories.description: Useful when you want to make a robust drink.
categories.seedNotice: Hops seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 3 in your bank.

shopPurchases.customDescription:
+1% Perfect Cook chance for Brewing Barrel only for a total of +1% from Brewing Barrel.
+1% Cooking XP for a total of +1% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Cooking XP for a total of +3% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Perfect Cook chance for Brewing Barrel only for a total of +3% from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Cooking XP for a total of +5% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Perfect Cook Chance from Brewing Barrel only for a total of +5% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Cooking XP for a total of +7% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+2% Perfect Cook Chance from Brewing Barrel only for a total of +7% Perfect Cook Chance from your Brewing Barrel.
+3% Cooking XP for a total of +10% Cooking XP from your Brewing Barrel.
+3% Perfect Cook Chance for Brewing Barrel only for a total of +10% Perfect Cook Chance from your Brewing Barrel.
+2.5% chance to receive an additional resource from Fishing (cannot be doubled) and -2.5% Fishing Interval.

+2.5% chance to receive an additional resource from Woodcutting (cannot be doubled) and -2.5% Woodcutting Interval.
Grants access to Pine trees.
-5% Mining Node Respawn Interval and +5% chance to deal no damage to Mining Nodes when Mining.
+2.5% chance to double items in Smithing and -2.5% Smithing Interval.
